span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】v. 过滤： to pass through a filter
【例】 steep the tea and then filter it to get rid of the leaves 浸泡茶叶，再将其过滤以去除废渣
【近】 screen
【考法 2】v. 去除杂质： to remove(usually visible) impurities from
【例】 After frying the chicken, we filtered the oil and kept it in the refrigerator冰箱 to use again.
【近】 clear, distill, garble, purify
【反】 adulterate 掺杂；contaminate 污染
